title: The Rejected Segments Show!
itunes:title: The Rejected Segments Show!
description:
Bobby goes through a big stack of rejected segments. These are all segments that were deemed not to be good enough for the main show. The segments include: Amy thinks she’s growing a tail, Raymundo won’t let his wife wear this article of clothing, Lunchbox on faking his own death and a segment where we shock artists.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
